   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Installation
============================================

DEEG requires Python version 3.6 or higher. 

**requires:**

numpy>=1.18.0

scipy>=1.5.4

mne>=0.22.0

pathlib>=1.0.1

torch>=1.7.0

you can install DEEG using pip:

::

   $ pip install deeg
